title: Exploratory Study Of Novel Oxide Conductors
abstractText: Metal oxides offer a host of important properties such as photocatalysts, semiconductors, superconductors, battery and fuel cell components, magnetic , ferroelectrics, piezoelectrics and catalysts. Here we have observed important new phenomena utilising a previously unexplored doping strategy. The purpose of this project is to validate these findings and if successful to establish an important new strand of oxide materials research.
